column1: # curie_map: # This contains the URLs prefixes used in the mapping file
#   skos: http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core# ### Always needed. Do not modify
#   sssom: https://w3id.org/sssom/             ### Always needed. Do not modify
#   codemeta: "https://codemeta.github.io/terms/" ### Always needed. Do not modify
# mapping_set_description: 'Mapping between codemeta and datacite following out methodology' ### Please
column2: add the description of your mapping
add a URI of the author of the mapping. Prioritize ORCIDs for persons and ROR ids for organizations
add a URI of your crosswalk. You can use the w3id.org service to create it.
